Text: Thanks bpfine.  I prefer cbr's but your generosity in producing/sharing IS appreciated.  Thank you.

Welcome

I don't use a comic book reader to view the jpeg source, I'd rather create a standalone PDF.
which requires Adobe Reader to read...

to bpfine: 
thanks!

to cbr lovers:
1. Open PDF.
2. Save as jpg.
3. Rar jpg files.
4. Rename the file extension from rar to cbr.
5. Enjoy!
